conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Can you tell us why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: Yeah, we've been waiting here for quite a while.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience, there seems to be a technical issue with the train ahead of us.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Do you have any idea how much longer it will take?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: I hope we won't be stuck here all night.
